授業目的:
The main objective is to improve students' ability to discuss educational issues in English.
The secondary objective is to improve their active vocabulary.
到達目標:
By the end of the course, students should be able to discuss, give their opinions on and present on the issues raised in
the course.
授業方法: Class will normally begin with warmup questions about recent events and the weather. There will be ample opportunity for pair and group work.

第1回: Introductions; First Semester - Discussion Questions (two rounds) ; instructor's schedule; Ontario teen seeks apology after board cancels visit from drag performers - model read.
Review. Ontario teen - read & look up vocabulary.
第2回: First Semester - Discussion Questions (one round). Ontario teen - read aloud & chorus (short segments).
第3回: Ontario teen - read aloud & chorus (long segments). Vocabulary Matching Exercise,
第4回:
Ontario teen - read aloud & chorus (students read aloud in turns). Vocabulary Matching Exercise,
Comprehension & Discussion Questions.
第5回: Ontario teen - students read aloud in turns. Cloze. Comprehension Questions. Drag is never appropriate for kids.
Drag is never appropriate for kids
第6回: Drag is never appropriate for kids - read aloud & chorus. Vocabulary Matching Exercises I & II.
Drag is never appropriate for kids - Comprehension & Discussion Questions.
第7回: Drag is never appropriate for kids  - students read aloud in turns. Comprehension & Discussion Questions.
第8回: Drag is never appropriate for kids  - students read aloud in turns.  is never appropriate for kids  - students read aloud in turns. Dictation Practice. Comprehension Questions.
第9回: Drag is never appropriate for kids  - students read aloud in turns. Dictation practice.
第10回: Drag is never appropriate for kids  - students read aloud in turns. Dictation practice.
第11回: Drag is never appropriate for kids  - students read aloud in turns.  first listening tests.
第12回: First listening test. The 'Infamous 96' Know Firsthand What Happens When Affirmative Action Is Banned - read aloud & chorus (short segments).     Vocabulary Matching Exercise I.
第13回: Return first listening tests.  The 'Infamous 96' Know Firsthand What Happens When Affirmative Action Is Banned - read aloud & chorus (short segments).     Vocabulary Matching Exercises.
第14回: Makeup (supplementary class. Review of May 31  or week 7 material.
第15回: Start of Fall Term Discussion Questions - two rounds. Go over revised syllabus. The 'Infamous 96' Know Firsthand What Happens When Affirmative Action Is Banned - read aloud & chorus (short segments).     Vocabulary Matching Exercises.
第16回: The 'Infamous 96' Know Firsthand What Happens When Affirmative Action Is Banned - read aloud & chorus (short segments).     Vocabulary Matching Exercises.  i
第17回: The 'Infamous 96' Know Firsthand What Happens When Affirmative Action Is Banned - model read.
第18回: The 'Infamous 96'  - read aloud & chorus (short segments). Vocabulary matching exercises I, II & III.
第19回: The 'Infamous 96'  - read aloud & chorus (long segments). Vocabulary matching exercises IV & V.
第20回: God & grades  - model read. Vocabulary Matching Exercise.
第21回: God & grades & grades - read aloud & chorus (short segments) Comprehension Questions
第22回: God & grades & grades - read aloud & chorus (long segments). Cloze. Discussion Questions
第23回: Group presentations - choose groups. God & grades & grades - students read aloud in turns. Cloze. Discussion Questions.

評価.学位授与の方針との関連Relationship to Diploma Polic:
各授業科目は、各学部・研究科の定めるディプロマ・ポリシー（DP）・カリキュラム・ポリシー（CP）に基づき、カリキュラム上に配置されています。
DP・CPを意識して本授業科目の学修を進めることで、各学部・研究科の期待する能力が養成されます。
各学部・研究科のDP、CPや教育課程表（授業科目一覧等）は、下記リンクこちらに掲載していますので学修計画の参考にしてください。
